plot: When never-famous 1980's comedian Alfred Snodoloberm takes one last shot at fame, he decides to do it the indie way - no money, no crew, nothing but himself. The result is a dark journey ...
title: Hell Leaks Laughter
plot_es: When never-famous 1980's comedian Alfred Snodoloberm takes one last shot at fame, he decides to do it the indie way - no money, no crew, nothing but himself. The result is a dark journey ...
